participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Amina is resilient and resourceful, always finding ways to adapt to her circumstances.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was a child. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was a teenager. i was born in somalia.

participant_2.name: Jake

participant_2.background: i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i waitress during the day to supplement my income.
